Html:
It looks like we're back to trinkets such as Eye of the Broodmother getting stacks off of Slow Fall, meaning we can preload stacks before combat.

Is there a way to model this in RAWR, telling it that I could start the combat with full stacks?

I'm currently equipping Talisman of Resurgence and Abyssal Rune (because RAWR says so), but with this change I'm trying to figure out if I should dig out my old Eye or Illustration of the Dragonsoul.

(Note: I've never twiddled with any item information in RAWR so detailed instructions would be most appreciated - if it can even be done.)

Thanks!
It's possible, but it would have to be a model-specific.  I suggest making a Feature Request for your specific model.
If you're referring to mage model it's assuming prestacked for all stacking trinkets if it'll help you interpret the results.

Oh, so it already assumes I'm starting the fight with full stacks?

Well that makes it much easier for me, thank you!
